project.name: C-C088B-GREP-01-ST02-DT02-DF11-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a filename to read in the file contents using an fread operation within the function Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C088B-GREP-01-ST02-DT02-DF11-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: all words beginning with e or x, case sensitive This weakness takes a filename from an untrusted source and uses a subprocess (via popen) to perform a search and replace of the text "hello" with "Hello". The untrusted input is not properly sanitized, and may be used to perform an argument injection on the base command in order to run additional commands or functions.

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
